message.name: ERR_GENERAL_CONST_ESZETT
message.locale: ÃŸ

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_FROM_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: From date field cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_TO_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: To date field cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_TO_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: The to date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_FROM_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: The from date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this record as it has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This record has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: A start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_NAME_ENTERED
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_START_DATE_AFTER_END_DATE
message.locale: Start date must be before the end date.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_START_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_START_DATE_EARLIER_CREATION
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than the creation date.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_END_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: An end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_MULTIPLE_RECORDS
message.locale: A singleton SELECT returned multiple records.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_SEARCH_MAX_RECORDS_UNDEFINED
message.locale: The environment variable defining the maximum number of search results is not defined.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_END_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: The end date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_END_DATE_SMALL
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: From date must not be later than the to date.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be later than end date.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_START_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: The start date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_BONUS_AMOUNT
message.locale: The bonus amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: INF_GENERAL_FV_LBY_NO_BONUS_ALLOWED
message.locale: A bonus cannot be set up on this product as it is a liability.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_START_DATE_SMALL
message.locale: The start date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_FROM_DATE_SMALL
message.locale: The from date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: INF_GENERAL_SEARCH_TOO_MANY_RECORDS
message.locale: Your search has exceeded the maximum limit for the number of records that can returned. Please narrow your search criteria.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_MAX_RECORDS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The maximum number of records allowed to be returned for this operation has been exceeded.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_OWN_USER_RECORD_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_BY_CURRENTLY_LOGINED_USER
message.locale: The user you are attempting to delete is currently logged into the system and therefore cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_MANDATORY_FIELD_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: %1s must be entered.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_XFV_PARENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A related parent record must be entered.

message.name: INF_DATE_BY_USERNAME
message.locale: %1s on %2d

message.name: INF_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: %1d to %2d

message.name: INF_DATETIME_BY_USERNAME
message.locale: %1d by %2s

message.name: INF_INVALIDATED
message.locale: and Invalidated

message.name: INF_OVERPAID
message.locale: Overpaid

message.name: INF_UNDERPAID
message.locale: Underpaid

message.name: INF_NO_CHANGE
message.locale: Net Zero Payment

message.name: INF_AMOUNT_OVERPAID
message.locale: %1d Overpaid

message.name: INF_AMOUNT_UNDERPAID
message.locale: %1d Underpaid

message.name: ERR_TEXT_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Text' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_LOCALE_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Locale' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRANSLATION_EXISTS_FOR_LOCALE
message.locale: A translation currently exists for the locale %1s. Please update the existing translation.

message.name: INF_NOT_AVAILABLE
message.locale: Not Available

message.name: ERR_PROCESSING_XML
message.locale: Critical error has occurred during XML processing.
